body_html:
@LuisaAPF Ah, ok. Sorry, I misunderstood it then.

I'm not sure we can completely delete the respond to html on the conferences_controller/create, because we still can create a conf from here: /conferences (not orga). Please tell me if I'm getting this wrong.

@LuisaAPF Ah, ok. Sorry, I misunderstood it then.

I'm not sure we can completely delete the respond to html on the conferences_controller/create, because we still can create a conf from here: `/conferences` (not orga). Please tell me if I'm getting this wrong.
